pages.text: $(li)The Sap Bottle is an item that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar)Sugar$(/l) and Sappy Maple Log in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can make $(l:patchouli:tools/autumnity/syrup_bottle)Syrup Bottle$(/l) Smelting a Sap Bottle in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).

$(li)To obtain a Sap Bottle, first you need to right click multiple Maple Log while you are holding any kind of $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l) in your hand.$(br)$(li)Doing this has a little probability that a Sappy Mapple Log appears.$(br)$(li)Finally right click the Sappy Mapple Log while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/glass_bottle)Glass Bottle$(/l) in your hand to obtain a Sap Bottle.
